title: MMA Junkie Radio #2990: UFC 243 and Bellator 229 recaps, Cain Velasquez in WWE, more
text:
Monday’s edition of MMA Junkie Radio with hosts “Gorgeous” George and “Goze” is here!

Episode 2,990 of the podcast includes a look back at Saturday’s UFC 243 card, Friday’s Bellator 229 card, Cain Velasquez in the WWE and more. The guys also discuss the latest MMA news and notes.

The rundown

Stream or download this and all episodes of MMA Junkie Radio over at AudioBoom, or check it out above. You can also catch it on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, and more. A new episode of the podcast is released every Monday and Thursday.
description: Hosts "Gorgeous" George and "Goze" break down the latest MMA news and notes, including a look back at the Bellator 229 and UFC 243 cards.
